name: Retro Hacker
description: Retro Hacker simulates hacking from a computer terminal with a text based operating system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible Graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 MB available space Sound Card: None
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later version Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Directx 11 Compatible Graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 MB available space Sound Card: None
